title: Game Crash Screen
body:
I finished a ranked game and the stats page was taking ages to load so I clicked Skip waiting for stats and now all I have on my league client is 'Game Crash' and the button to click to try to reconnect. when I click that i just get a black screen with nothing happening. I tried to close client and re-open but it didn't help.

any help would be appreciated.

Also Merry Christmas to all.

replies.body:
Be warned, you're in a spoooooooooooooky ghost game. Usually happens when the servers are suddenly cut-off and restored.

Thing is though, the timing and the fact that no one else is getting it might mean it's just you, not the server. Weird.

Try waiting it out. Should be gone in a day, max.

Edit: Just saw the other threads. This might be a fault on Riot's side.
